attributes.action: Hold a general election to bring an end to the revolving door of Tory PMs.
attributes.additional_details: The Conservative party have squandered what little remaining good will they have with the electorate after a series of poor decisions which have resulted in the UK becoming a political and economic laughing stock. A general election should be held immediately to determine the will of the people.
attributes.background: A general election should be held immediately to determine the will of the people in these unprecedented political and economic times.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
